resources.string:
Window content is not captured.

To capture window content exit Inspect Mode and try to update window content by doing one of these:

1. Move application to background and back to foreground.
2. Open recent apps screen, then return back to application.
3. Perform navigation within application (i.e. navigate back or forward).
Displayed attributes provided by QA Toolkit Bridge Service.
Currently inspected application doesn\'t have QA Toolkit Bridge Service installed.\n\nDisplayed attributes provided by accessibility service.
Can\'t connect to QA Toolkit Bridge Service.\n\nDisplayed attributes provided by accessibility service.
QA Toolkit Bridge Service can\'t find selected view. Move application to background, restore it and try again.\n\nDisplayed attributes provided by accessibility service.

QA Toolkit Bridge Service can\'t provide attributes for selected view.

Either view is virtual, or its accessibility delegate has been overridden. For more information about virtual views check \"Provide a customized accessibility context\" section.

Displayed attributes provided by accessibility service.
There was an error during communication with QA Toolkit Bridge Service. Either QA Toolkit Bridge Service or QA Toolkit app is outdated.\n\nDisplayed attributes provided by accessibility service.
